Package jp.co.cam.universal.context

Interface UserInfoIF

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractUserInfo, DefaultUserInfo
public interface UserInfoIF extends Serializable
[universal](commons)This class is the management class for user information.

See UserInfoFactory for usage

  • Method Details

    • getInfinityDataMap

      DataMap<String,Object> getInfinityDataMap()
      This method returns the data container for user.
      The value of this container will be stored with user information.
      And It's available using @context:key.
      Returns:
      Data container

    • getDefaultTimezone

      TimeZone getDefaultTimezone()
      This method returns the default TimeZone.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system TimeZone setting.
      Returns:
      TimeZone

    • setDefaultTimezone

      void setDefaultTimezone(TimeZone pmZone)
      This method sets the default TimeZone.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system TimeZone setting.
      Parameters:
      pmZone - TimeZone

    • getTimezone

      TimeZone getTimezone()
      This method returns the TimeZone for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system TimeZone setting.
      Returns:
      TimeZone

    • setTimezone

      void setTimezone(TimeZone pmZone)
      This method sets the TimeZone for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system TimeZone setting.
      Parameters:
      pmZone - TimeZone

    • getLanguage

      String getLanguage()
      This method returns the language for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system Locale setting.
      Returns:
      Language (example:ja, en)

    • setLanguage

      void setLanguage(String pmLang)
      This method sets the language for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system Locale setting.
      Parameters:
      pmLang - Language (example:ja, en)

    • getCountry

      String getCountry()
      This method returns the country for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system Locale setting.
      Returns:
      Country (example:JP, US)

    • setCountry

      void setCountry(String pmCountry)
      This method sets the country for user.
      * Initial value : Refers to the system Locale setting.
      Parameters:
      pmCountry - Country (example:JP, US)

      This method returns the User name.

      This method sets the User name.

      pmName - User name

    • getCommandValue

      Object getCommandValue(String pmCmd)
      This method returns the value corresponding to "@context:command".
      Method for handling @context:command in rule engine.
      You can override and extend this method.
      Parameters:
      pmCmd - @context:command
      Returns:
      value

    • clear

      void clear()
      This method clears all data.
      * Excluding : Language/Country/TimeZone
